title: Interest in Law School Is Surging. A.I. Makes the Payoff Less Certain.
description: The number of applicants has risen more than 40 percent over the last two years, despite new limits on student loans and uncertainty over how artificial intelligence will affect legal work.
content:
For decades, the American law school has served as a popular hedge against a cooling economy. When the “Help Wanted” signs disappear, the “J.D.” applications surge.
That’s what is happening now. The number of U.S. law school applicants for the 2026 c... [1716 chars]

title: 'A fear of becoming obsolete'
description: More workers are talking about their anxiety around artificial intelligence in therapy, therapists say.
content:

title: AI Innovation: The Next Frontier for Investors Amid Geopolitical Swells
description: Amid geopolitical uncertainty, investors are looking towards artificial intelligence to drive future profits. With major earnings reports due and a Federal Reserve meeting impending, the focus shifts to corporate profits boosted by AI advancements. The Fed's political independence and rate outlook also hold significant weight.
